markdownRemark.html:
So, about this site. It’s currently running on my Raspberry Pi 4B and is running on Gatsby JS.

So, my site is behind Cloudflare’s Reverse Proxy to also hide my IP address and to enable SSL (HTTPS) on the site.

Also, my site has a metrics system enabled and can be viewed on /netdata

And I’ll write posts that seems interesting in the future to be viewed in the blog.
